Thrown by db backend containing all available error informations. More...

Detailed Description

Thrown by db backend containing all available error informations.

This exception is thrown by the database backend and contains all available error informations provided by the backend

◆ sql_state()

const char* matador::database_error::sql_state ( ) const
noexcept

Returns the sql state according to the SQL standard provided by the database backend. It is a 5 char long string representing a sql error code.

SQL States

Returns
SQL State
